languages.text: "Меня тревожит, что мы можем недооценить врага. Один раз блюстители уже сделали это. Я... Гильдия Инфернус хотела бы быть с вами в этой битве. Я уверен, что где-то в контуре склепа сделан проход, через который выродки пробрались внутрь. Мы лучше всех знаем служебные коммуникации, мы могли бы отыскать этот лаз и ударить врагу в спину. Не думаю, что кучка работяг с топорами и горелками переломит исход битвы, но мы будем рады погибнуть за вас".

"I fear we might be underestimating the enemy. The enforcers have already done it once. I... The Infernus Guild would join you in this fight, if you would have us. To get inside, the aberrations would have had to make a passage for themselves somewhere in the crypt's perimeter. No one knows the maintenance tunnels better than us. We could find this breach and attack the enemy from the rear. I doubt a few workers armed with axes and torches will make much of a difference, but we would be honoured to die in your name."
languages.original_text: "Меня тревожит, что мы можем недооценить врага. Один раз блюстители уже сделали это. Я... Гильдия Инфернус хотела бы быть с вами в этой битве. Я уверен, что где-то в контуре склепа сделан проход, через который выродки пробрались внутрь. Мы лучше всех знаем служебные коммуникации, мы могли бы отыскать этот лаз и ударить врагу в спину. Не думаю, что кучка работяг с топорами и горелками переломит исход битвы, но мы будем рады погибнуть за вас".

We could find this breach and attack the enemy from the rear. I doubt a few workers armed with axes and torches will make much of a difference, but we would be honoured to die in your name."

languages.text: « Je crains que nous sous-estimions l'ennemi. Les prévôts ont déjà commis cette erreur. Je... La guilde infernus voudrait se joindre à vous, si vous êtes d'accord. Pour réussir à entrer, les aberrations ont forcément dû ouvrir un passage par eux-mêmes quelque part dans le périmètre de la crypte. Personne ne connaît les tunnels de maintenance mieux que nous. On pourrait trouver cette brèche et prendre l'ennemi à revers. Je doute que quelques ouvriers armés de haches et de torches fassent la différence le moment venu, mais nous serions honorés de mourir en votre nom. »
languages.original_text: "I fear we might be underestimating the enemy. The enforcers have already done it once. I... The Infernus Guild would join you in this fight, if you would have us. To get inside, the aberrations would have had to make a passage for themselves somewhere in the crypt's perimeter. No one knows the maintenance tunnels better than us. We could find this breach and attack the enemy from the rear. I doubt a few workers armed with axes and torches will make much of a difference, but we would be honoured to die in your name."

traits.locale_text: « Je crains que nous sous-estimions l'ennemi. Les prévôts ont déjà commis cette erreur. Je... La guilde infernus voudrait se joindre à vous, si vous êtes d'accord. Pour réussir à entrer, les aberrations ont forcément dû ouvrir un passage par eux-mêmes quelque part dans le périmètre de la crypte. Personne ne connaît les tunnels de maintenance mieux que nous. On pourrait trouver cette brèche et prendre l'ennemi à revers. Je doute que quelques ouvriers armés de haches et de torches fassent la différence le moment venu, mais nous serions honorés de mourir en votre nom. »

languages.text: «Temo que estemos subestimando al enemigo. Los guardias ya lo han hecho una vez. Yo... El gremio de infernus quiere unirse a esta lucha, si nos acepta. Para entrar, las aberraciones tienen que haber creado un pasaje en algún punto del perímetro de la cripta, y nadie conoce los túneles de mantenimiento mejor que nosotros. Podríamos dar con esta brecha y atacar al enemigo por la retaguardia. Dudo que un puñado de trabajadores armados con hachas y antorchas marque la diferencia, pero sería un honor morir en su nombre».
languages.original_text: "I fear we might be underestimating the enemy. The enforcers have already done it once. I... The Infernus Guild would join you in this fight, if you would have us. To get inside, the aberrations would have had to make a passage for themselves somewhere in the crypt's perimeter. No one knows the maintenance tunnels better than us. We could find this breach and attack the enemy from the rear. I doubt a few workers armed with axes and torches will make much of a difference, but we would be honoured to die in your name."

traits.locale_text: «Temo que estemos subestimando al enemigo. Los guardias ya lo han hecho una vez. Yo... El gremio de infernus quiere unirse a esta lucha, si nos acepta. Para entrar, las aberraciones tienen que haber creado un pasaje en algún punto del perímetro de la cripta, y nadie conoce los túneles de mantenimiento mejor que nosotros. Podríamos dar con esta brecha y atacar al enemigo por la retaguardia. Dudo que un puñado de trabajadores armados con hachas y antorchas marque la diferencia, pero sería un honor morir en su nombre».

languages.text: “我担心我们可能低估了敌人，执法者们已经低估过敌人一次了。如果您愿意的话，我……控火行会愿意加入这场战斗。既然那些怪物要进入地下墓穴，那他们肯定会在周围的某个地方开辟了一条通道。没人比我们更了解维修通道，我们可以找到这个缺口，从后面对敌人发起攻击。虽然一群拿着斧头和火把的工人未必能派得上太大用场，但我们都愿意为了您的荣耀而英勇献身。”
languages.original_text: "I fear we might be underestimating the enemy. The enforcers have already done it once. I... The Infernus Guild would join you in this fight, if you would have us. To get inside, the aberrations would have had to make a passage for themselves somewhere in the crypt's perimeter. No one knows the maintenance tunnels better than us. We could find this breach and attack the enemy from the rear. I doubt a few workers armed with axes and torches will make much of a difference, but we would be honoured to die in your name."

traits.locale_text: “我担心我们可能低估了敌人，执法者们已经低估过敌人一次了。如果您愿意的话，我……控火行会愿意加入这场战斗。既然那些怪物要进入地下墓穴，那他们肯定会在周围的某个地方开辟了一条通道。没人比我们更了解维修通道，我们可以找到这个缺口，从后面对敌人发起攻击。虽然一群拿着斧头和火把的工人未必能派得上太大用场，但我们都愿意为了您的荣耀而英勇献身。”

languages.text: 「敵を過小評価しているのではないかが、怖いです。エンフォーサーはすでに一度、それをやってのけた。私、インフェルヌス・ギルドも必要ならこの戦に参加します。内部に入るためには、忌まわしきものは地下墓地のどこかに通路を作らなければならない。メンテナンス・トンネルを熟知しているのは我々だけです。この裂け目を見つけて、背後から敵を攻撃すればいい。斧と松明で武装した数人の労働者が大差をつけるとは思えないが、あなたの名において死ねるなら光栄です」
languages.original_text: "I fear we might be underestimating the enemy. The enforcers have already done it once. I... The Infernus Guild would join you in this fight, if you would have us. To get inside, the aberrations would have had to make a passage for themselves somewhere in the crypt's perimeter. No one knows the maintenance tunnels better than us. We could find this breach and attack the enemy from the rear. I doubt a few workers armed with axes and torches will make much of a difference, but we would be honoured to die in your name."

traits.locale_text: 「敵を過小評価しているのではないかが、怖いです。エンフォーサーはすでに一度、それをやってのけた。私、インフェルヌス・ギルドも必要ならこの戦に参加します。内部に入るためには、忌まわしきものは地下墓地のどこかに通路を作らなければならない。メンテナンス・トンネルを熟知しているのは我々だけです。この裂け目を見つけて、背後から敵を攻撃すればいい。斧と松明で武装した数人の労働者が大差をつけるとは思えないが、あなたの名において死ねるなら光栄です」

languages.text: "Ich fürchte, wir könnten den Feind unterschätzen. Das haben die Enforcers schon einmal getan. Ich ... Die Infernus-Gilde würde Euch in diesem Kampf beiseitestehen, wenn Ihr uns lasst. Um hineinzukommen hätten die Abscheulichkeit irgendwo an den Außenwänden der Krypta einen Durchgang schaffen müssen. Niemand kennt die Wartungstunnel besser als wir. Wir könnten diesen Durchgang finden und den Feind von hinten angreifen. Ein paar Arbeiter mit Äxten und Fackeln werden wohl kaum einen großen Unterschied machen, doch es wäre uns eine Ehre, in Eurem Namen zu sterben."
languages.original_text: "I fear we might be underestimating the enemy. The enforcers have already done it once. I... The Infernus Guild would join you in this fight, if you would have us. To get inside, the aberrations would have had to make a passage for themselves somewhere in the crypt's perimeter. No one knows the maintenance tunnels better than us. We could find this breach and attack the enemy from the rear. I doubt a few workers armed with axes and torches will make much of a difference, but we would be honoured to die in your name."

Ein paar Arbeiter mit Äxten und Fackeln werden wohl kaum einen großen Unterschied machen, doch es wäre uns eine Ehre, in Eurem Namen zu sterben."

languages.text: "Düşmanı fazla küçümsüyor olabileceğimizden endişeleniyorum. İnfazcılar öyle yaptı. Ben... İtfa Loncası, izniniz olursa bu savaşta size katılmak istiyor. Bu sapkılar, içeri girebilmek için mahzenin çevresinde bir yere kendilerine bir geçit açmış olmalı. Kimse bakım tünellerini bizden daha iyi tanıyor olamaz. Bu gediği bulabilir ve düşmana arkadan saldırabiliriz. Baltalı ve meşaleli birkaç işçinin çok fark yaratacağını düşünmüyorum ama uğrunuza ölmek bizim için onur olur."
languages.original_text: "I fear we might be underestimating the enemy. The enforcers have already done it once. I... The Infernus Guild would join you in this fight, if you would have us. To get inside, the aberrations would have had to make a passage for themselves somewhere in the crypt's perimeter. No one knows the maintenance tunnels better than us. We could find this breach and attack the enemy from the rear. I doubt a few workers armed with axes and torches will make much of a difference, but we would be honoured to die in your name."
